page.title: 10Home Life in Wootton Bassett
page.content: We have found out that we all get up at different times. We get up between 6am and 8am. We wash and dress ourselves and have some{ breakfast}in the morning. Some of us walk to school, others travel by taxi or minibus. There are five schools in our town. Secondary school children work from 8.45 to 12.45 and younger children from 9 until 12 in the{morning.} Primary children work 1 until 3 in the {afternoon}and the older children from 1.45 to 3.45.Most of us have a hot meal or sandwiches in school at midday.We have a mid morning break. { After school}we play records or tapes,ride bikes, go to the park, walk the dog,play on our computers, read books and watch television.At the end of the day we go up stairs to our own bedrooms and read before we sleep.
